name: A Hero's Dangerous Journey
description: Alas evil has risen again to take over the peaceful kingdom of Dongding. Thankfully this isn’t that big of a deal, this kind of thing happens every century and is stopped by a great hero who is hand picked by the gods to save the day. However this time is different, they choose YOU!?! You arent a warrior, noble, or anything. You’re just a peasent who’s never picked up a weapon in your life. Whelp good luck dung shoveler because you have quite the journey ahead of you. You must leave town Immediately and enter the Endless Forest full of dangerous animals. After that make your way brave warrior to the Cave of Wondering Souls. Continue going deeper and deeper into the cave till you reach the Outskirts of Hell. If by a miracle you survive, head your way to the Bringer of Death’s Castle. Good luck chosen one, we’re counting on *Crackles* you. After saying goodbyes to friends and loved ones the great hero sets off on his journey to save the kingdom of Dongding.
